title: Star Crossed
description: “He must wait for the sun to rise, then he will do the impossible, he will face the sun without a ring and once he can do that he’ll be unstoppable.”Julie Colray and her husband Rome are vampires living peacefully in London, easily blending in amongst the many humans that live in the heart of the country. But when Rome is kidnapped by unknown men Julie has to work with those who guard the humans from those like herself in order to save him.But something powerful and deadly lurks in the shadows, something that bends the very laws of nature and threatens their very existence.
author: Louise Matchett
